thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: #FeesmustFall

author: news24.com
title: #FeesmustFall
text:
As much as I don't condone violence, SA students have been taken for a ride for far too long and it's about time they unite to raise their concerns because at the rate this increments are being implemented there will be no students at tertiary institution other than those from wealthy families or bursary students, which then leaves a bleak future for those who are currently at high schools with the hope of going to varsity upon completion of their matric.
What I loved about today's events was that Western Cape students realized the root cause for this chaos and demonstrated their anger a the right direction (Parliament) for a change, which makes me urge all the varsity students who are protesting to take a leap out of WC students and direct their anger and frustrations to the right directions.
